ul.li: AxisDataServer.wsdl The wsdl that describes the interface of the Datacenter web service.
ADQLSchema.xsd Schema defining the version of the ADQL query language used in the Datacenter web service
AxisDataServer.xsd Schema defining types passed by the Datacenter web service - referenced by AxisDataServer.wsdl
User.xsd Schema defining the common astrogrid user / authentication type - referenced by AxisDataServer.xsd
